SYN_BRONCH_3_7:
[Indication]
Bilateral lung masses.

[Anesthesia]
General, 8.5 ETT.

[Description]
1. RUL: Fungating endobronchial mass found. Biopsied (TBNA x5, Forceps x6). Epinephrine used for hemostasis. ROSE: Malignant.
2. LLL: Peripheral lesion localized with Radial EBUS. Biopsied (TBNA x4, Forceps x5). Epinephrine used. ROSE: Necrosis.
3. BAL: LLL Superior segment performed.

[Plan]
Await final pathology. CXR post-op.
